title: datalad install -r  errors out with KeyError
body:
```
$> datalad --version
datalad 0.14.2.dev265

$> git -C /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master describe           
0.14.2-265-g485b769da
```

so might be a bit dated master branch:

```
(git)smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> datalad install -d . -s https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data -r studyforrest
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)
[INFO   ] Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore
install(ok): studyforrest (dataset)
[WARNING] Got jobs=6 but we cannot use threads with Pythons versions prior 3.8.0. Will run serially
add(ok): studyforrest (file)
add(ok): .gitmodules (file)
save(ok): . (dataset)
[INFO   ] Installing Dataset(/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/studyforrest) to get /mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/studyforrest recursively
[INFO   ] Fetching 'https://datapub.fz-juelich.de/studyforrest/studyforrest.ria/0f6/6b1ba-e9a9-46fd-b9d9-2e64fe94d307/config'
install(ok): studyforrest/code/conversion_qa (dataset)
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)
[ERROR  ] Target commit 2ccaa115 does not exist in the clone, and a fetch that commit from origin failed [install(/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/studyforrest/derivative/aggregate_fmri_timeseries)]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     install(error): studyforrest/derivative/aggregate_fmri_timeseries (dataset) [Target commit 2ccaa115 does not exist in the clone, and a fetch that commit from origin failed]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     [INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     [ERROR  ] Target commit 74cd7ec0 does not exist in the clone, and a fetch that commit from origin failed [install(/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/studyforrest/derivative/aligned_mri)]
...
install(error): studyforrest/original/7T_multiresolution_fmri (dataset) [Target commit 10e23aaf does not exist in the clone, and a fetch that commit from origin failed]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     [INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
[ERROR  ] Target commit 72f835ad does not exist in the clone, and a fetch that commit from origin failed [install(/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/studyforrest/original/phase2)] 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
install(error): studyforrest/original/phase2 (dataset) [Target commit 72f835ad does not exist in the clone, and a fetch that commit from origin failed]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     [INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
[ERROR  ] Target commit 29dcce2b does not exist in the clone, and a fetch that commit from origin failed [install(/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/studyforrest/stimulus/curated_annotations)] 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
[ERROR  ] 'id' [get.py:_get_flexible_source_candidates_for_submodule:246] (KeyError) 
Installing (11 failed):  92%|███████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████           | 12.0/13.0 [00:00<00:00, 60.9 datasets/s]
datalad install -d . -s  -r studyforrest  20.87s user 11.09s system 25% cpu 2:04.71 total
```

continued with 
```
(git)smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/studyforrest[master]git
$> datalad get -r -n .  
```
will report later on how that one fails (so far the same commit reachability issues)
